posts.message:
WADL Documents
If you're familiar with SOAP APIs, they have WSDL documents that describe the data types and methods of the API.
REST seem to have something similar, WADL documents.
Anybody has expierence with WADL?
I'd like to work on generating WADL for a REST API, and I'm not sure how.
More info on WADL
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Application_Description_Language

posts.message: This post is all over the internet today. It explains to non-programmers the different kinds of challenges/obstacles that we programmers face in our work.
posts.caption: stilldrinking.org
posts.description: Every friend I have with a job that involves picking up something heavier than a laptop more than twice a week eventually finds a way to slip something like this into conversation: "Bro,1 you don't work hard. I just worked a 4700-hour week digging a tunnel under Mordor with a screwdriver."
